Let’s celebrate & remember what Pride month is all about - it’s more than buying commercial products w rainbow labels.

It’s about acting in celebration, acceptance, & solidarity w of people of ALL gender expressions + sexual orientations.

RT @davidsirota “When it comes to health care, there is #NoMiddleGround. Health care is a human right, not a privilege and we will guarantee health care to all of our people through a Medicare for All single-payer system.” - @BernieSanders at today’s California Dem Party convention https://twitter.com/aoc/status/1135316065238622208 QT @AOC ✅ Medicare for All IS sound policy - one may disagree w/ it, but plenty of other countries have single payer + better outcomes than the US
✅ M4A IS good politics - it polls VERY well in swing states
✅ “Third-Way” (aka lobbyist-backed Dems) WILL lose the presidency to Trump

The GOP is working overtime to dismantle labor unions, which are exceedingly popular with the American public.

Unions secure higher wages and better work conditions. We should support them, even if we’re not in one. (Or look into unionization in your industry!)

#Solidarity 💪 https://twitter.com/rmc031/status/1135187876285747206 QT @rmc031 GOP activists hired consultants to survey voters and "identify the best words and phrases" to shape their talking points around weakening unions. we published their full 86-slide powerpoint presentation  https://theintercept.com/2019/05/31/union-dues-home-care-workers/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D8D-DOcW4AAC_Ct.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D8D_MPHXYAUb-5p.png http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D8D_QktXkAApmun.png

Even from a “market competition” perspective, it’s a bad long-term strategy.

The reason young people are leaving Facebook in droves is bc its unchecked toxicity makes it an awful place to be.

Think abt this as Big Tech lobbies for monopoly power to prevent mkt competition.

RT @davidsirota "The Vermont senator repeatedly insisted that there is 'no middle ground' on issues like abortion, gun control and health care, and predicted that 'we will not defeat Donald Trump unless we bring excitement and energy into the campaign.'" #NoMiddleGround https://www.mercurynews.com/2019/06/02/bernie-sanders-democratic-convention-joe-biden/

Soon we will send soldiers to Afghanistan who weren't even born yet on September 11, 2001.

We've spent $5 trillion dollars on wars since 9/11.

And now some of the same people that got us into Iraq are trying to start a war with Iran.

We must end our endless wars.

Tens of thousands of Americans die every year because they lack health insurance.

There is no "middle ground" when it comes to health care. 

We will guarantee health care to all of our people through Medicare for All. #NoMiddleGround

Hey everyone - I was super excited to march in Queens Pride today, but sadly I came down with a really bad cold this weekend and won’t be able to make it 😭

Our organizers will be marching + tabling at the festival with resources for the community. Celebrate extra for me! 💕🌈

Couldn’t let this suit go to waste✨

Thanks to some extra rest, medicine + vaporu (😉) we were able to rally + join everyone for a bit at #Pride today.

Thanks @CabanForQueens + @JimmyVanBramer for saying hi! ⬇️ https://twitter.com/1010wins/status/1135273072175525888 QT @1010WINS 'Here we are!': @AOC battles bad cold, makes it to Queens #Pride https://1010wins.radio.com/articles/ocasio-cortez-battles-bad-cold-makes-queens-pride-festival http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D8FMt_sXoAAgNkK.jpg

RT @AlexSJacquez Dignity and a living wage for all workers #NoMiddleGround https://twitter.com/berniesanders/status/1134510350341160962 QT @BernieSanders More than a third of all teachers have worked a second job to makes ends meet. And average wages for public school teachers have gone DOWN over the last 20 years.

As president, I will ensure teachers are paid what they deserve — a starting salary at least $60,000 a year.

As we celebrate #PrideMonth, let us also remember how far we have come because of the struggle led by the LGBT community and their allies. I will always stand in solidarity with our LGBT friends to ensure everyone in America is free to love and live as their true selves. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D8FElTCXUAE_Dpo.jpg
When it comes to abortion, there is no “middle ground.” A woman has the right to control her own life, not the government. #NoMiddleGround

This awful, untrue line got boo’ed for a full minute.

The holy grail of many social platforms is “engagement.”

Bigotry + disinformation campaigns are often the most “engaging” (& rewarded) due to their inflammatory nature.

Some, like Pinterest+Reddit, at least TRY to address this.

Others decide profit is worth the social erosion. https://twitter.com/gaywonk/status/1134831623877406720 QT @gaywonk YouTube lets toxic and hateful videos flourish on their platform because they’re good for engagement. 

They aren’t LGBT allies. They’re exploiting us. Because hate makes money. https://www.bloomberg.com/news/features/2019-04-02/youtube-executives-ignored-warnings-letting-toxic-videos-run-rampant http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D7-7SwGXsAEzb_G.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D7-7SvyWsAE1_Bf.jpg

As uncomfortable as it is, we must speak truth that Black mothers are 3 to 4 times more likely die from pregnancy-related causes in part because of implicit bias in our health care system. My Maternal CARE Act would held address this - it's critical that we pass it in Congress.

As San Francisco’s District Attorney, I helped make California the first state to ban the “gay/trans panic” defense, which was often used to justify horrendous violence against the LGBTQ+ community. It’s time we pass the bill to ban it nationwide.
